title: Inaugural Isar Spectrum Flight Expected Within “Next Few Months”
summary:
A Norwegian government announcement has revealed that Isar Aerospace expects to conduct the inaugural flight of its two-stage Spectrum rocket within the “next few months.” In September 2024, an Isar spokesperson told European Spaceflight that all components for its first Spectrum rocket had arrived at Andøya Spaceport in Norway. Isar also confirmed that static fire […]
The post Inaugural Isar Spectrum Flight Expected Within “Next Few Months” appeared first on European Spaceflight.
